clues.clue: This word means a story with a moral, often featuring animals
Someone who has committed a grave crime, differing from a misdemeanor
This word means to make something or to invent a lie
A disturbed state of consciousness in which the one affected seems to perform acts in full awareness but upon recovery cannot recollect the acts performed
This term refers to all the animal life in a particular region or time period
This Greek letter, also a math symbol for change or difference, looks like a triangle
This Greek god ruled the sea with his trident
In Greek mythology, she opened a box releasing all evils into the world
This Greek word for 'time' gives us words like 'chronic' and 'chronology'
This hero completed 12 labors, including slaying the Nemean Lion
This Meta-owned photo platform introduced Boomerang to create looping video clips
To work for Uber Eats, you need to be 19 to drive a car, but only 18 to use one of these low-tech options
This app has trademarked 'swipe left' & 'swipe right'
This short-form video platform's algorithm is so good at keeping you scrolling, it's been called addictive
This rhyming ticket app does not support will-call tickets, but does have a last-minute services option
This halogen with atomic number 17 is commonly found in swimming pools and household bleach
This element's name comes from the Greek for 'stranger' and is used in high-intensity lamps and anesthesia
Named after the Sun, this element was first discovered in the solar spectrum before being found on Earth
This metalloid with atomic number 14 is the second most abundant element in Earth's crust and is essential for computer chips
This radioactive element with atomic number 88 was discovered by Marie Curie and glows in the dark
This Italian coffee drink is made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with foam
This drink is espresso 'marked' with just a dollop of foamed milk
This potent and collorfully named drink combines drip coffee with a shot of espresso for an extra caffeine kick
This Spanish coffee drink gets its name from being 'stained' with a small amount of milk
This Italian dessert drink consists of espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream or gelato
Dante used this hellish word as a title for the first part of 'The Divine Comedy'
Latin for 'fiery' gives us this term for a basic classification of rock
This phrase means to add more problems to an already bad situation
clues.solution: What is 'add fuel to the fire'?

clues.clue: This idiom means something or someone is doing extremely well or having great success
Now an idiom for any irreversible course, this was suggested by Sun Tzu after an army crossed hostile borders
clues.solution: What is 'burn the boats' (or 'burn the ships')?

clues.clue: African these have big ears shaped like the continent of Africa; Asian ones have smaller, rounder ears
The biggest of the big cats are these hybrids known by a portmanteau name
The biggest horse breed, the Shire, has been known to reach more than 21 of these horsey units high
The green species of this snake can reach 30 feet & 550 pounds
In 2021 scientists identified a new species of this based on a 16-foot female that had been washed ashore
This leather seat is secured on a horse's back for riding
This word describes something that cannot be stopped or changed, often used to describe forces or trends
This word means to happen or take place
This large African animal is known for its aggressive nature despite spending most of its time in water
This crime involves the unlawful use of force or violence against another person
Einstein's most famous equation relating mass and energy
This theorem states that in a right triangle, the square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides
Newton's second law of motion is expressed as F equals m times this
This equation for the area of a circle uses π times this measurement squared
Schrödinger's equation is fundamental to this branch of physics dealing with subatomic particles
This 1996 3D platformer introduced players to Peach's Castle and revolutionized gaming with analog control
This 2011 Bethesda RPG features dragons, the Thu'um shout system, and the phrase 'I used to be an adventurer like you...'
This 2001 Xbox launch title introduced Master Chief and revolutionized console first-person shooters
This 2004 Valve game introduced the Gravity Gun and physics-based puzzles with protagonist Gordon Freeman
This 1991 Capcom fighting game introduced Hadouken moves and world warriors competing in tournaments
Known as 'The Lone Star State', this large southern state was once its own republic
This state is nicknamed 'The Volunteer State' for its residents' eagerness to serve in the military
This northwestern state is 'The Beaver State'
This state calls itself 'The Ocean State' despite being the smallest in the nation
'The Land of Enchantment' is the nickname for this southwestern state known for its deserts and Native American culture
This ancient Roman arena could hold up to 80,000 spectators for gladiatorial contests
This London clock tower, officially named Elizabeth Tower, is famous for its bell that chimes on the hour
This famous cathedral in Paris, completed in 1345, was severely damaged by fire in 2019
This white marble mausoleum in Agra, India was built by Shah Jahan for his wife
Designed by Jørn Utzon, this Australian landmark with distinctive white 'shells' houses a performing arts center
clues.solution: What is the Sydney Opera House?

final.clue: This 1215 document signed by King John limited the power of the English monarchy and established the principle that everyone is subject to the law
